name: dbrmn-google-assistant-demo
description: Demo of a Dialogflow fulfillment webhook for Actions on Google

scripts.ngrok: node -e "(async () => { const ngrokUrl = await require('ngrok').connect(8080); const processTitle = '[' + ngrokUrl + '] â€“ npm run devPublic'; process.stdout.write(String.fromCharCode(27) + ']0;' + processTitle + String.fromCharCode(7)); console.log('ngrok URL:', ngrokUrl); })();"
scripts.devPublic: concurrently -r "npm run dev" "sleep 2.5 && npm run ngrok" || true
